short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share current tab, links and selected text on Bluesky.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use the toolbar button, the context menu options or the keyboard shortcut (Alt + B). Supports bsky.app and custom servers. 

Visit homepage for detailed usage guide: https://browsernative.com/bluesky-chrome-extension/

Extension by BrowserNative. Not affiliated with or endorsed by Bluesky Social.
